# Control Bento

Bento-style reference for ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Annex A controls. The dataset is provided as machine-readable JSON and the UI surfaces summaries and implementation guidance.

## Data
- controls.json (all 93 controls with overview, core points, in practice, and evidence examples)

## Pages
- index.html (main UI)

## Updates
Last updated: 2026-02-12

## Usage
Please reference the control ID and title when citing content.
